practiceAreas: Family Law (Divorce, Child Custody, Alimony, Domestic Violence)|Bankruptcy (Chapter 7 and 13)|Personal Injury|Trusts & Estates|Criminal Defense
description:
If you face a divorce or other thorny family law issue, come to Paré & Associates, LLC, in Germantown, Maryland. At our law firm, you can expect to receive the superior legal advice, counsel and representation you seek and deserve.

As a full-service law firm, we know that family law issues are not the only ones that can disrupt your life. Consequently, our 30-plus years of experience can benefit you in the following areas:

  • Divorce
  • Alimony (spousal support)
  • Child custody and support
  • Domestic violence issues
  • Trusts and probate
  • Bankruptcy
  • Personal injury
  • Criminal defense

Whatever legal problems you face, you will always find an empathetic ear at our law firm. Beginning with your free initial consultation, we listen to you, answer your questions, advise you of all your options going forward, and help you establish goals. We then put our knowledge, skill and experience to work for you so that, working together, we can achieve those goals to the greatest extent possible.

You will be glad to know that Paré & Associates, LLC, offers virtual appointments for not only your convenience, but also your health and safety. In addition, we accept all major credit cards in payment of our highly competitive and eminently reasonable legal fees. Finally, if Spanish is your native language, no problem. Se habla español in addition to English.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
